posts.post_content:
Posted By: jrhatchjr
Searching for the following 1911 T212 example in low grade - ideally fair, poor or worse: 
 
- R. Brashear, Vernon

As long as the cards can be recognized as 1911 series Obaks, ANY type of damage is acceptable.

Prefer to trade, willing to buy.
If trading, please send wantlist and/or interests.
If selling, please send asking price.


Many thanks,
Jim
check_raze (at) yahoo.com


"I'd rather have a hole in my card than a hole in my collection any day."
